page.title: 08Play Group
page.content: The play group is held to help pre-school children to meet and mix with each other. It is for children between 2 to 3 years old and school age. The play group belongs to a national organisation for play groups and receives a grant at the end of each tax year. Most funds are raised by village functions. 24 children attend for 4 mornings each week. There is a mothers and toddlers meeting each Thursday morning. This organisation enables mothers at home with young children to meet. The meetings take place in the Methodist Community Hall.
